content: Hi All, from all the responses received, we should now have at least 10 mentors for GCI! That is the baseline needed for submitting an application, which I will work on completing this week. Thank you for all that stepped up to be mentors.

Mentors, please be thinking about task ideas. We're looking into whether to use GitHub issues or something else (there are a couple tools developed by other orgs), but for now you can get started locally with independently useful ideas.
Emphasis on org-independent tasks so we just have 1 set of beginner onboarding tasks. A VM with all CAx codes on it would be fantastic (maybe that should be a set of GCI tasks...).
